item.title: By: David Westerink
item.dc:creator: David Westerink
item.description: Do you know about a little gem called lol_dba? It's a small gem that helps you find good indexes on your database. Check it out; https://github.com/plentz/lol_dba
item.content:encoded: Do you know about a little gem called lol_dba? It’s a small gem that helps you find good indexes on your database. Check it out; https://github.com/plentz/lol_dba
